phraseList.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Believeyou can and you are halfway there
Today is gonna be the day that they're gonna throw it back to you.
Go shawty, it's your birthday, we gon' party like it's yo birthday.
Bass! How low can you go? Death row, what a brother knows.
You may think that I’m a dreamer. But I’m not the only one.
Hello Darkness My Old Friend. I’ve Come To Talk With You Again…
Get your stinking paws off me, you damned dirty ape.
Mrs.Robinson, you're trying to seduce me. Aren't you?
They may take our lives, but they'll never take our freedom!
The first rule of Fight Club is: You do not talk about Fight Club.
You've got to ask yourself one question: 'Do I feel lucky?' Well, do ya, punk?
Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi. You're my only hope.
Itis only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye
I took a deep breath and listened to the old brag of my heart: I am, I am, I am.
Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
When you play the game of thrones you win or you die.
And now, cried Max, let the wild rumpus start!
It is nothing to die; it is dreadful not to live.
Very few castaways can claim to have survived so long at sea as Mr. Patel, and none in the company of an adult Bengal tiger.
How much wood would a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?
Susie works in a shoeshine shop. Where she shines she sits, and where she sits sheshines
A skunk sat on a stump and thunk the stump stunk, but the stump thunk the skunkstunk-
Where’s the peck of pickled peppers Peter Piper picked?
You know New York, you need New York, you know you need unique New York
I scream, you scream, we all scream for ice cream
I have got a date at a quarter to eight; I’ll see you at the gate, so don’t be late.
Ifa dog chews shoes, whose shoes does he choose?
I invented a new word! Plagiarism!
Russian dolls are so full of themselves.
Never trust atoms; they make up everything.
I didn’t think orthopedic shoes would help, but I stand corrected.
Blunt pencils are really pointless.
One of the cows didn’t produce milk today. It was an udder failure.
A dung beetle walks into a bar and asks, ‘Is this stool taken?
Pollen is what happens when flowers can’t keep it in their plants.
Geology rocks, but geography’s where it’s at.
I went to buy some camo pants but couldn’t find any.
My friend’s bakery burned down last night. Now his business is toast.
I love you right up to the moon—and back.
Let the wild rumpus start!
There’sno place like home
I shall find out thousands and thousands of things!
Why, sometimes I’ve believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast
One of the cows didn’t produce milk today. It was an udder failure.
Ilike people who make me like them. Saves me so much trouble forcing myself to like them.
He’sthe strongest man in the world.” “Man, yes,” said Pippi, “But I am the strongest girl in the world, remember that.
She asked why I was breathing so heavily. I wasn't.
There was a picture of my phone of me sleeping. I live alone
Don't look behind you. It doesn't like to be seen.
Alone in my room, I sneezed softly. 'Bless you,' someone said.
I heard screams echo all around me. I'm deaf.
One of the cows didn’t produce milk today. It was an udder failure.
There'sa girl standing outside my window. The only problem is I live on the seventh floor.
Ican't move, breathe, speak or hear and it's so dark all the time. If i knew it would be this lonely, I would have been cremated instead.
